web_snippets: Tal Barda is known for I Shall Not Hate (2024), The Wonderful Kingdom of Papa Alaev (2016) and The Silent Fighters. More at IMDbPro.
Tal Barda is a French American documentary filmmaker and producer born and raised in Jerusalem. She is a board member of the Israeli documentary film forum.
Tal Barda is a French American documentary filmmaker and producer born and raised in Jerusalem. Graduate of Tel Aviv University (Israel) - Film & Television ...
